official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House that the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 should not be extended beyond its present expiration date of April 30, 1974.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House that the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 should not be extended beyond the present expiration date of April 30, 1974.
